actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To extend until January 1, 1998, the existing suspensions of duty on m-Xylenediamine ("MXDA") and 1,3-Bis(aminomethyl) cyclohexane ("1,3-BAC").

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1997, the suspension of duty on: (1) m-xylenediamine (MXDA); and (2) 1,3-bis(aminomethyl) cyclohexane (1,3-BAC).

titles.title: To extend until January 1, 1998, the existing suspensions of duty on m-Xylenediamine ("MXDA") and 1,3-Bis(aminomethyl) cyclohexane ("1,3-BAC").
